      Callback that notifies when a consumption operation finishes.
      static interface  IabPay.OnPurchaseCompletedListener
      Callback that notifies when a purchase is finished.
      static interface  IabPay.OnQueryInventoryListener
      Listener that notifies when an inventory query operation completes.

        public void pay(Context context,
       String parametersJson,
       PayCallBack payCallBack)
         throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: Payable
        Payment method Just provides following parameters, other parameters would be in collect automatically // SdkConstants.TRANSACTION_ID transactionId // SdkConstants.PRIVATE_DATA // SdkConstants.PAY_ORIGIN // SdkConstants.NOTIFY_URL // SdkConstants.QUANTITY // SdkConstants.PRODUCT_ID
        指定者:
        pay 在接口中 Payable
        参数:
        context - the application context that call this pay method
        parametersJson - parameter list in json string
        payCallBack - payment callback. Please refer to PayCallBack for detail
        抛出:
        Exception

      • getConsumeListener

        public IabPay.OnConsumeListener getConsumeListener()

      • setConsumeListener

        public void setConsumeListener(IabPay.OnConsumeListener consumeListener)
        Set the consume listener This is optional. some payment approach need NO such consume listener, but some payment such as the Google IAB needs such one. This is asynchronous and the specified listener will be called once init completes.
        参数:
        consumeListener -

      • initAsync

        public abstract void initAsync(Context context,
             List<String> skuIds,
             IabPay.OnQueryInventoryListener inventorylistener,
             IabPay.OnConsumeListener consumeListener,
             IabBroadcastReceiver.IabBroadcastListener iabBroadcastListener)
        Initialize process. This will start up the setup process asynchronously. You will be notified through the inventorylistener when the setup process is complete. This method is safe to call from a UI thread.
        参数:
        context -
        skuIds - the Sku ids to retrieve the SKU detailed information.
        inventorylistener - The listener to notify when the setup process is complete and inventory return.
        consumeListener - The listener to notify when the consumption is complete .
        iabBroadcastListener - The listener to notify when the broadcast message "com.android.vending.billing.PURCHASES_UPDATED" is received.

      • queryInventoryAsync

        public void queryInventoryAsync(IabPay.OnQueryInventoryListener listener)
        Query inventory from server in async way.
        参数:
        listener - the callback listener when inventory is completely queries.

      • queryInventoryAsync

        public abstract void queryInventoryAsync(boolean querySkuDetails,
                       List<String> moreSkus,
                       IabPay.OnQueryInventoryListener listener)

      • consumeAsync

        public abstract void consumeAsync(Purchase purchase,
                IabPay.OnConsumeListener listener)
        Asynchronous wrapper to item consumption. Works like #consume, but performs the consumption in the background and notifies completion through the provided listener. This method is safe to call from a UI thread.
        参数:
        purchase - The purchase to be consumed.
        listener - The listener to notify when the consumption operation finishes.

      • handleActivityResult

        public abstract boolean handleActivityResult(int requestCode,
                           int resultCode,
                           Intent data)
        Handles an activity result that's part of the purchase flow in in-app billing. If you are calling launchPurchaseFlow(android.app.Activity, java.lang.String, int, com.apusplay.sdk.pay.IabPay.OnPurchaseCompletedListener), then you must call this method from your Activity's Activity@onActivityResult method. This method MUST be called from the UI thread of the Activity.
        参数:
        requestCode - The requestCode as you received it.
        resultCode - The resultCode as you received it.
        data - The data (Intent) as you received it.
        返回:
        Returns true if the result was related to a purchase flow and was handled; false if the result was not related to a purchase, in which case you should handle it normally.

      • launchPurchaseFlow

        public abstract void launchPurchaseFlow(Activity act,
                      String sku,
                      int requestCode,
                      IabPay.OnPurchaseCompletedListener listener)
        Launch the flow to purchase the item
        参数:
        act - the caller activity
        sku - the sku id string
        requestCode - request code
        listener - the callback when finished purchase flow

      • launchPurchaseFlow

        public abstract void launchPurchaseFlow(Activity act,
                      String sku,
                      int requestCode,
                      IabPay.OnPurchaseCompletedListener listener,
                      String extraData)
        Launch the flow to purchase the item
        参数:
        act - the caller activity
        sku - the sku id string
        requestCode - request code
        listener - the callback when finished purchase flow
        extraData - extra data to launch purchase flow. The extra data could be logged down for further processing in the future.

      • launchPurchaseFlow

        public abstract void launchPurchaseFlow(Activity act,
                      String sku,
                      String itemType,
                      List<String> oldSkus,
                      int requestCode,
                      IabPay.OnPurchaseCompletedListener listener,
                      String extraData)
        Initiate the UI flow for an in-app purchase. Call this method to initiate an in-app purchase, which will involve bringing up the Google Play screen. The calling activity will be paused while the user interacts with Google Play, and the result will be delivered via the activity's Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent) method, at which point you must call this object's handleActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent) method to continue the purchase flow. This method MUST be called from the UI thread of the Activity.
        参数:
        act - The calling activity.
        sku - The sku of the item to purchase.
        itemType - indicates if it's a product or a subscription (ITEM_TYPE_INAPP or ITEM_TYPE_SUBS)
        oldSkus - A list of SKUs which the new SKU is replacing or null if there are none
        requestCode - A request code (to differentiate from other responses -- as in Activity.startActivityForResult(android.content.Intent, int)).
        listener - The listener to notify when the purchase process finishes
        extraData - Extra data (developer payload), which will be returned with the purchase data when the purchase completes. This extra data will be permanently bound to that purchase and will always be returned when the purchase is queried.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Dispose of object, releasing resources. It's very important to call this method when you are done with this object. It will release any resources used by it such as service connections. Naturally, once the object is disposed of, it can't be used again.
